segments.text: I see a busy kitchen scene before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing by the sink, diligently drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus is completely on the task at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice water is flowing freely from the faucet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sink basin is completely full.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Oh dear, the water is now spilling over the front edge in a steady stream!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s creating a significant puddle on the cabinet doors and the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot is actually submerged in the growing puddle, yet she shows no sign of noticing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She continues to polish that plate with an almost serene expression.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: How can she be so oblivious to the chaos unfolding around her?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's truly astonishing how absorbed she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps running and running.
segments.speaker: PAR
